    • Highlights

    • Experience the charm of Cochin with its blend of colonial history, scenic beaches, and vibrant culture.
    • Visit popular attractions like Fort Kochi, Jewish Synagogue, and the famous Chinese fishing nets.
    • Explore the serene backwaters nearby for a taste of Kerala's tranquil landscape.
    • Relax on Cherai Beach and discover the bustling markets of Cochin.

    Kerala - Quick Kochi - 3 Nights / 4 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Kochi

    • Arrive in Kochi and transfer to your hotel.
    • Evening free to explore the local markets and nearby areas.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kochi.

    Day 2: Kochi Sightseeing

    • Explore Fort Kochi, visit the famous Chinese fishing nets and St. Francis Church.
    • Tour Mattancherry Palace and the Jewish Synagogue in the historic Jew Town.
    • Enjoy an evening walk along Marine Drive.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kochi.

    Day 3: Backwaters and Cherai Beach

    • Take a morning backwater cruise to experience Kerala’s iconic waterways.
    • Head to Cherai Beach to relax or enjoy water activities.
    • Return to Kochi for an overnight stay.

    Day 4: Departure from Kochi

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel.
    • Transfer to the airport or railway station for your onward journey.
    • End of the Quick Kochi tour.
